Page.Name: AAClaimPage
Page.Text: :x:For a limited time, you can purchase one of the following items for . This offer will no longer be available if you close this window or if the offer time has expired.

Composite.Name: Composite
Composite.Text: :13a20c741f7a0d45:Thank you for your purchase! The following items have been placed into your inventory.

Page.Name: InformationPage
Page.Text: :aef3f1e27a92e8cc:NOTE: You are currently on an exchange server, you may only move to other exchange servers.

Page.Name: StateAndZipPage
Page.Text: :13a20c747da90124:Please confirm your state and zip code.

Page.Name: GiftPage

TextboxPlayerName.Name: Recipient
TextboxPlayerName.Tooltip: :aef3f1e2a7d8c957:The name of the character to whom this gift should go. For example: Zoltaroth or Antonia Bayle.Zoltaroth

Page.Text: :13a20c745af37426:[DEVL] Item With a Very Very Very Very Very Very Long Name

Page.Name: PaymentSourcePage
PPSMSPage
Page.Text: :13a20c74463780f1:After clicking Continue you will be taken to an external web browser to complete this transaction.

Page.Name: RedeemPage
Page.Text: :aef3f1e25a21002a:To Redeem for Membership Time or SC

Page.Name: InfoPage
Page.Text: :13a20c74a81b8da5:After clicking Continue you will be taken to an external web browser to complete this transaction. You can use your new card by clicking Add Funds again.

Button.Name: Help
Button.Tooltip: :13a20c742081ad60:Enter the 3 or 4 digit card verification number normally located on the back of your credit card.

Page.Text: :13a20c74ea6e178f:All items are no-drop; non-transferable; no refund or exchange.

Page.Name: SelectAmountPage
Page.Text: :13a20c74c0e3bc68:Select the amount of Daybreak Cash you'd like to purchase.

Page.Name: DeliveryPage
Page.Text: :13a20c74a6c44fd4:Thank you for your purchase! The following item has been delivered.

Page.Name: ItemTemplate
Page.Text: :aef3f1e25af37426:[DEVL] Item With a Very Very Long Name

Textbox.Name: FilterText
Textbox.Tooltip: :13a20c7497c48f88:Enter a search term and press enter.

Page.Name: HouseDescPage
Page.Text: :aef3f1e2eaa677b6:Some fairly long text that describes the house

Button.Name: CancelHouseButton
Button.Tooltip: :aef3f1e20f5b8b1e:Cancel your house listing and return the house to your character if the house has not yet sold a copy.
